title: Patient Fulfills His Vow To Fallen Soldiers While Recovering From Spinal Cord Injury | Jefferson Health
description: While recovering from a spinal cord injury, Jeremy, a Navy veteran, feared he wouldn't be able to pay his respects as he did every Memorial Day. Luckily, day rehab allows for excursions, and his occupational therapist ensured he got there.
